item.title: εκδρομή by Dimitra Galani (Greek to English)
item.description: My roommate recommended this song to me in 2022 and I liked it so much I decided to translate it into English. You can play the Greek version here.

item.title: Annabelle by Steff la Cheffe (Swiss German to German)
item.description: This was one of the first Swiss German songs I discovered when I was learning German in high school. You can listen to it here.

item.title: Valet by Erich Arendt (German to English)
item.description: I completed the below translation for DoubleSpeak, a journal for poetry in translation, while an undergraduate at Penn.

item.title: My Step 1 experience
item.description: How I passed Step 1 after 8 months of medical school using only Anking and UWorld.

item.title: Research
item.description: View my Google Scholar here. First-author publications R. Chen, Á. Duffy, (…), R. Do. Expanding drug targets for 112 chronic diseases using a machine learning-assisted genetic priority score. Nature Communications 2024. R. Chen, B. O. Petrazzini, (…), M. Bansal, R. Do. Comparison of blood-based liver fibrosis scores in the Mount Sinai Health System, MASLD Registry, and NHANES 2017-2020 study. Hepatology Communications 2024. R. Chen, B. O. Petrazzini, W. Malick, R. Rosenson, R.

item.title: Resources
item.description: Science Olympiad I enjoy science outreach and have been a Science Olympiad event supervisor since 2018. Exams I have written are listed below. [Anatomy and Physiology] 2023 MIT Science Olympiad Invitational Tournament Exam Answer Sheet Answer Key [Water Quality] 2020 Pennsylvania Science Olympiad Regional Tournament Exam Image Booklet Answer Booklet Answer Key [Water Quality] 2019 Pennsylvania Science Olympiad State Tournament Exam Image Booklet Answer Booklet Answer Key [Water Quality] 2019 Pennsylvania Science Olympiad Regional Tournament Exam Image Booklet Answer Booklet Answer Key
